desc: Established in 1923 and with the 4th generation of the family now at the reins, H. E. Payne and Sons Ltd have specialised in the retail and repair of all footwear types for almost a century. Home to The Greatest Shoeman, an artisan in his craft, we are a superior, well known restorer of the Christian Louboutin brand.

layout.text: Est. 1923 H.E. Payne and Sons Ltd has been retailing and repairing footwear to the highest standard for almost a century
